pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ caranti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.4: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.5: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.12: “Yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.6: yassa vijite viharati, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa raṭṭhe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.8: tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.10: tasmiṃ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.14: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.15: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
